backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing authenticated CRUD and filtering of document metadata with blob references using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files and components with highâ€‘confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent changes of all key frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme variables for light/dark modes using OKLCH colors and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes wrapped in AuthGate and AppShell with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate using Internet Identity that shows a login card with the new uncropped login image when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Document actions UI enabling view, download, and delete operations with dialogs, toast feedback, and navigation.
Renders a filter panel for documents with category, office, direction, date range, and text search, including logic to reset filters and sync office options by category.
Displays documents in a sortable table with icons and navigation, supporting infinite loading and metadata display.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Shows an empty-state message with an illustration and a button to navigate to the upload page.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, theme toggle, and account dropdown using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: React Query mutation hook to delete a document and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document by ID using React Query and the authenticated actor.
Fetches filtered documents from backend, applies client-side text search and pagination, and returns visible results.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles uploading a document by reading the file, encoding it, sending metadata to backend, tracking progress, and refreshing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation of an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, themes, and utility classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Maps Category enums to human-readable labels and provides category options for selects.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Converts office enums and string IDs to labels or Office objects and includes helpers for office selection.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information and preview of a selected document with actions and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Shows filterable, paginated document listings with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Provides a form to upload a new document with file input, metadata fields, validation, and progress handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking feature requests, known issues, and requirements for updating the login screen image.
